about_the_game:
The contents of this DLC are as follows:

-----------------------------------------------
[Category : QoL3 in Epic Store]
- Automation [Map Expansion] (500 EC)
- Automation [Active Skill] (3500 EC)
- Automation [Retry Mission] (1500 EC)
- Automation [Mission Tour] (2500 EC)
- Automation [Retry Challenge] (9500 EC)
- Automation [Challenge Tour] (5000 EC)

[Category : Other]
- Red Ball + 1
------------------------------ Equivalent to a total of 22500 EC

This DLC includes many useful Automations. We have carefully selected QoL that is useful for idle play. You can go around Missions and Challenges without clicking or hitting keys. In addition, you can activate Active Skill without wasting cool time. Enjoy comfortable idle play!

Note:
- In the Epic Store, you can purchase premium items and useful QoL with the in-game currency Epic Coin.
- If you already purchased the QoL in this DLC, the Epic Coin for that QoL will be returned.
ex.) If you already purchased "Automation [Map Expansion]" in QoL3 of Epic Store before, and purchased this DLC, then you will gain its contents except for "Automation [Map Expansion]", and also additionally 500 Epic Coin.
- The number of red balls increase from the beginning of the game. In addition, the effect of Nitro is applied.
- It stacks with other DLC.
